name: OnOff
description:
OnOff is a first person puzzle platformer game where you can switch your light on and off. Whenever you turn it off everything coloured will be bright and full of energy but you have to turn it on to see things in the darkness and find hidden objects to solve the level.

This prototype was made months ago but never uploaded due some heavy bug I had. However,the bug is solved and now it has 7 playble level! I planning to add more content in the future.

If you have any feedback, advice or something else, please leave a comment.
